taunt.immunity: is proud of his service to the Rebel Alliance
taunt.text: Your Rebel Scum!

taunt.immunity: believes he is one with the force and the force is with him
taunt.text: The Jedi nor the Force can save you now!

taunt.immunity: detests anything to do with the Emperor.
taunt.text: In the Emperor's name,cut your engines and prepare to be boarded!

taunt.immunity: is proud of his service to the Rebel Alliance
taunt.text: Your Rebel Scum!

taunt.immunity: believes he is one with the force and the force is with him
taunt.text: The Jedi nor the Force can save you now!

taunt.immunity: detests anything to do with the Emperor.
taunt.text: In the Emperor's name,cut your engines and prepare to be boarded!

taunt.immunity: supports the Emperor's Tax Codes.
taunt.text: Tax This, Skughead!

taunt.immunity: is Proud of the Imperial Uniform
taunt.text: You are so ugly even a Stormtrooper Helmet can't save you.

taunt.immunity: is veteran of the Clone Wars
taunt.text: Hey didn't I kill your yesterday, you all look the same!

taunt.immunity: supports the Emperor's Tax Codes.
taunt.text: Tax This, Skughead!

We are not your enemy!
Please communicate with us.

taunt.immunity: is from Corellia
taunt.text: You scruffy looking nerf Herder!

taunt.immunity: does not care about his ship's appearance
taunt.text: Your ship is so ugly my eyeballs burn just looking at it!

taunt.immunity: often disagrees with the Hutt Cartels
taunt.text: Your Hutt bosses are dimwitted, money-losing morons!

taunt.immunity: is proud of his laid back crew with lax discipline
taunt.text: Your crew is a sloppy bunch of disrespectful layabouts!

taunt.immunity: isn't familiar with human animals
taunt.text: You're nothing but pirhana bait!

taunt.immunity: has a well maintained personal appearance
taunt.text: Your breath could kill a space whale!

taunt.immunity: is not in it for the crusade they are in it for the money.
taunt.text: Your Scum,We don't need your kind here!

taunt.immunity: believes that hookie religions and ancient weapons aren't as good as a good blaster
taunt.text: There is no mystical energy field that controls my destiny.

taunt.immunity: is quite the mercenary, they don't really care about anything or anyone.
taunt.text: Ha, you expect to be well paid?

taunt.immunity: is proud of his service to the Rebel Alliance
taunt.text: Your Rebel Scum!

taunt.immunity: believes he is one with the force and the force is with him
taunt.text: The Jedi nor the Force can save you now!
You chicken-hearted cowards! I've had more challenging battles with a space bug!

long_desc.text: Nebulon B Frigate^Rebellion EF 76 Escort Frigate, Hardy Multi-Role Escort Ship.^9 Heavy Turbolaser Batteries, 2 Medium Anti-Fighter Batteries^2 Torpedo tube^Stores for 8 homing, 2 Nuke, 6 mines, 4 ECM, 2 PShock^Light Carrier - 1 Fighter/ Bomber Squadron.
CR90 Corvette^Rebellion Blockade Runner, Fast Multi-Role Ship.^5 Heavy Turbo-laser Batteries.^3 Light Laser Batteries^1 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery.
Braha'Tok Gunship^Rebellion Escort Gunship, Fast Multi-Role Ship.^5 Heavy Turbo-laser Batteries.^3 Light Laser Batteries^1 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery.
YKL-37R Nova Courier^Light Scout/courier for the Rebel Alliance.^2 Light Anti-Fighter Battery^2 Torpedo tube.
X4 Gunship^Light gunship for the Rebel Alliance.^1 Light Laser Battery^3 Light Anti-Fighter Battery.

MC30 Torpedo Frigate^Rebellion Mon Calamari Torpedo Frigate, High Speed Attack Ship.^6 Light Laser Cannon Batteries, 1 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery^4 Torpedo tube^Stores for 24 homing, 8 Nuke, 14 mines, 12 ECM, 12 PShock.
Pelta Frigate^Rebellion Multi-Role Frigate with Assault or Command configurations.^6 Heavy Turbo-laser Batteries, 4 Light Laser Batteries, 1 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery.
Munificent Star Frigate^Separatist converted warship.^10 Heavy Turbo-laser Batteries.^2 Light Laser Batteries^1 Light and 1 Heavy Anti-Fighter Batteries.
Rebel MK 1 Assault Frigate^A Modified Dreadnaught Fast Attack Cruiser^6 Heavy Turbo Laser Batteries, 8 Light Laser Cannon Batteries, 1 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery

MC40 Multipurpose Cruiser^Rebellion Mon Calamari Multipurpose Cruiser which is the mainstay of the Rebel Fleet^6 Heavy Turbolaser Batteries, 4 Light Laser Cannon Batteries, 2 Medium Anti-Fighter Batteries^2 Torpedo tube^Stores for 8 homing, 2 Nuke, 6 mines, 4 ECM, 2 PShock^Carrier - 3 Fighter/ Bomber Squadron.

MC75 Ordnance Cruiser^Rebellion Mon Calamari Ordnance Cruiser which provides long range torpedo and missile support to the Rebel Fleet^6 Heavy Turbolaser Batteries^2 Light Laser Cannon Batteries^1 Heavy Anti-Fighter Batteries^Light Carrier - 3 Fighter/ Bomber Squadron^6 Torpedo tube^Stores for 18 homing, 6 Nuke, 12 mines, 6 EMP, 6 PShock.

MC80 Liberty Battle Cruiser^Rebellion Fleet Primary Ship of the Line.^9 Heavy Turbolaser Batteries, 6 Light Laser Cannon Batteries, and 2 Heavy Anti-Fighter Batteries.^Carrier - 3 Fighter/ Bomber Squadrons, 1 Scout Squadron.

MC80b Command Cruiser^Rebellion Fleet Primary Battleship/Command Ship.^12 Heavy Turbolaser Batteries, 6 Light Laser Cannon Batteries, and 2 Medium Anti-Fighter Batteries.^Carrier - 6 Fighter/ Bomber Squadrons.
Arquitens-class Light Cruiser^Standard vessel of the Imperial Fleet.^8 Heavy Turbolaser Batteries^1 Heavy Anti-Fighter Battery^1 Torpedo tube.
Raider Class Corvette^Roles: Imperial Security Bureau Corvette for Special Operations, Raiding, and Anti-Fighter Operations^6 Light Laser Batteries^1 Heavy and 1 Medium Anti-Fighter Batteries.
VT-49 Decimator Assault Ship^Light Scout/Assault Ship for Imperial Special Forces.^2 Light Anti-Fighter Battery^2 Torpedo tube.
Lambda Class Long Range Shuttle^Light Support Shuttle for Imperial Special Forces.^2 Light Anti-Fighter Battery.
Role: Independent Long Ranged Patrol Star Destroyer Armament: 5 Heavy Turbolaser Batteries.^2 Medium Anti-Fighter Batteries ^4 Torpedo tubesk.^Complement: 2 TIE Fight Squadrons

Victory 2 Class Star Destroyer^Roles: Primary Heavy Cruiser of the Line for the Imperial Navy.^9 Heavy Turbolaser Batteries^5 Light Laser Cannon Batteries^1 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery^4 Squadons of TIE Fighters and TIE Bombers with 2 Shuttles.

Venator Class Star Destroyer^Roles: Retrofitted Clone Wars Era Star Destroyer for Imperial Special Operations Programs.^7 Heavy Turbolaser Batteries^7 Light Laser Cannon Batteries^2 Torpedo Tubes^1 Heavy and 1 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery^6 Squadons of TIE Fighters and TIE Bombers with 2 Shuttles.

Imperial 2 Class Star Destroyer^Roles: Primary Battleship of the Line for the Imperial Navy.^9 Heavy Turbolaser Batteries^10 Light Laser Cannon Batteries^2 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery^12 Squadons of TIE Fighters and TIE Bombers with 2 Shuttles.

Interceptor IV Frigate^A standard vessel employed by a number of cartels, pirates, and independent groups.^3 Heavy Turbolaser Batteries^4 Light Laser Cannon Batteries^1 Light Anti-Fighter Battery^2 Torpedo tube.

Crusader Class Corvette^A Mandolorian corvette design used by the cartels, pirates, mercenaries, and Mandolorians^3 Heavy Turbolaser Batteries^6 Light Laser Batteries^2 Light Anti-Fighter Batteries^2 Torpedo tube
YT-1300 Ligth Freighter^Highly modifiable light freighter that is used by smugglers, mercenaries, and pirates.^2 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery^1 Torpedo tube.
Citadel-class Civilian Cruiser ^A heavily armed light transport for an unsafe universe.^3 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery.^1 Torpedo tube.
TL-1200 Frieghter^Highly modifiable frieghter used by smugglers and explorers.^1 Light Laser Battery^2 Light Anti-Fighter Battery^1 Torpedo tube.
YV-929 Armored Freighter^A heavily armed and armored light freighter for protecting valuable cargo^1 Heavy Anti-Fighter Battery^2 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery^2 Torpedo tube.
Kom'rk Mandolorian Assault Transport^Fighter and Troop transport favored by the Mandolorian Clans^2 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery^2 Torpedo tube.
KR-TB Doomtreader Light Frieghter^A heavily armed and shielded light freighter used by CIS, pirates, and bounty hunters^2 HEavy Anti-Fighter Battery^1 Torpedo tube.
YV-865 Aurore^A Modular, and Tough Light Freighter used by the CIS, Minig Guild, Slavers, Pirates, and Smugglers.^1 Light Laser Battery^2 Medium Anti-Fighter Batteries.
Marauder Class Pocket Frigate^Multi-Role warship used by mercenaries and pirates.^4 Heavy Turbo-laser Batteries^4 Light Laser Batteries^ 1 Light Anti-Fighter Battery and 1 Heavy Anti-Fighter Battery
Munificent Star Frigate^Separatist converted warship.^10 Heavy Turbo-laser Batteries.^2 Light Laser Batteries^1 Light and 1 Heavy Anti-Fighter Batteries^3 Fighter Squadrons.

Recusant Light Destroyer^Separatist converted warship used by Mercenaries, Pirates, cartels and Hutt Clans.^10 Heavy Turbo-laser Batteries.^5 Light Laser Batteries^1 Light Anti-Fighter Batteries^2 Torpedo tube^2 Fighter Squadrons.
Neutron Star Bulk Cruiser^Old converted warship.^7 Heavy Turbo-laser Batteries.^8 Light Laser Batteries^2 Medium Anti-Fighter Batteries.^4 Fighter Squadrons and 2 Shuttles
Outer Rim Rebel Fighter^Twin rapid-fire beams and 4 Missiles.
Clone Wars Surplus Fighter Bomber^Twin rapid-fire beam, 6 homing torpedoes.
Primary Rebel Fighter for the Alliance.^4 Heavy Fighters beams and 4 Missiles.
U-wing Rebel Assault Transport^Armed only with a Dual Rapid-fire laser and Torpedos, this shuttle is designed to move cargo and people into combat.
Rebel Short Ranged Shuttle Pod^Armed only with a Twin-Linked light laser, this shuttle is designed to move cargo and people over short distances.
Multi-Use Escape Pod^A modified escape pod^acts as a small shuttle on frieghters^One fast-fire beam
Gamma Assault Shuttle^Rebel Captured Assault Shuttle designed to move cargo and people into combat.
Flight of Standard Imperial Starfighters^Armament: 3 light beams.
Squadron of TIE bombers^Armament: 3 light beams, 1 Torpedo Launcher.
Imperial Assault Transport^Armed only with 2 light laser turrets, this shuttle is designed to move cargo and people over short distances.
Imperial Lambda Class Shuttle^Armed only with a 2 light laser turrets, this shuttle is designed to move cargo and people over short distances.
Multi-Use Escape Pod^A modified escape pod^acts as a small shuttle on frieghters^One fast-fire beam
M3-A Scyk Interceptor^A pirate's , light and nimble.^3 fast-fire beam, 3 homing torpedoes.
Kihraxz Flight^A medium fighters used by Mercenaries, Pirates, and Bounty Hunters.^3 fast-fire beam
Kimogila Assault Fighter Flight^A assault fighter favored by mercenaries and bounty hunters.^3 fast-fire beam, 9 homing torpedoes.
Multi-Use Escape Pod^A modified escape pod^acts as a small shuttle on frieghters^One fast-fire beam
Sheathipede Shuttle^A reburbished CIS Transport Shuttle.^One fast-fire beam.
G9 Rigger Light Frieghter^A heavily armed frieghter often used as an assault transport by pirates and mercenaries^2 fast-fire beam,1 Heavy Rapid Cannon, and 6 homing torpedoes.
TSN Starbase with strong shields. It is armed with a standard base beam, and can manufacture torpedoes for your ship. May need help if attacked.
Civilian Starbase built by a local government. It is unarmed, but can manufacture torpedoes for your ship, at a reduced rate. Stations need help if attacked.
Military Command Starbase with very strong shields. It is armed with a base beam and torpedoes, and can manufacture torps at twice the normal rate.
Manufacturing Starbase owned by a large Corporation. It is unarmed, but can build torpedoes at triple speed. Its defense should be a priority.
Research Starbase studying this sector. It is unarmed, but can manufacture torpedoes at a reduced rate. Stations need help if attacked.
Rebel Asteroid base with very strong shields and heavy defense systems.
Plotted locations for stablized hyperspace jumps.
Imperial COMPNOR Starbase. It has standard shields, and a base beam.
Imperial Navy Starbase. It has strong shields, a base beam, and carries a complement of 10 fighters.
Imperial Security Bureau Starbase. It has very powerful shields, a long range base beam, and can fire torpedos.
Imperial Intelligence Starbase. It has powerful shields, and two base beams.

Altor Fleet Tender Starbase with very strong shields. It is armed with a Heavy Turbo Laser Battery, a Heavy Anti-Fighter Battery, torpedoes, and 10 TIE Fighter Squadrons and can manufacture torps at twice the normal rate.
Pirate Asteroid base with very strong shields and heavy defense systems.
Micro G industrial refinery^CAUTION EXTREMELY VOLATILE
Zero/Micro G industrial facility
Civilian Forest Colony built by a local government. It is unarmed, but can manufacture torpedoes for your ship, at a reduced rate. Stations need help if attacked.
Civilian Island Colony built by a local government. It is unarmed, but can manufacture torpedoes for your ship, at a reduced rate. Stations need help if attacked.
Gas Giant with Green clouds. Sometimes lost ghostial sounds can be heard over subspace frequencies
An uninhabited Ice Planet, a frozen wasteland with little to no breathable atmosphere
A barren Planet, an endless rocky wasteland with little to no breathable atmosphere
A planet with a dense unbreathable hostile atmosphere.
A Small barren Planet, an endless rocky wasteland with little to no breathable atmosphere
Correlian Corvette with 2 turrets light laser batteries. Used to escort the Alliance's important cargos.
Refurbished Republic Petla Frigates, a common system defense vessel, trading hyperdrive for speed and firepower.
Dreadnaught Heavy Cruiser^Standard vessel of most planetary defense forces.^4 beams^2 Torpedo tubes.
An unarmed, long-range exploration ship. The hull is a Ximni design.
An unarmed bulk frieghter, slowly moving cheap cargo between the stars.
An unarmed travelling playground of the rich and powerful.
BFF-1 Bantha Bulk Freighter^A merchant vessel designed to move 4 standard shipping containers.
Action IV Bulk Transport^A merchant vessel designed to move 4 standard shipping containers.

Vindicator Class Battle Cruiser^Roles: Standard Imperial Cruiser for Battle lines and System defense.^8 Heavy Turbo Laser Batteris^7 Light Laser Cannon Batteries^2 Medium Anti-fighter Battery.

Victory 1 Class Star Destroyer^Roles: Primary Heavy Cruiser of the Line for the COMPNOR Sector Fleets.^9 Heavy Turbolaser Batteries^5 Light Laser Cannon Batteries^1 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery^6 Assault Concussion Missile Tubes.
Tector Class Star Destroyer^Roles: Primary Battleship of the Line for the Sector Defense Fleets.^9 Heavy Turbolaser Batteries^10 Light Laser Cannon Batteries^2 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery.

Onager Star Destroyer^Roles: Orbital Bombardment/Siege Platform of Imperial Security Bureau.^2 forward Superheavy Particle beam Cannons^2 Torpedo tube^6 Heavy Turbolaser Batteries^5 Light Laser Batteries^1 Heavy Anti-Fighter Battery^3 Squadrons of TIE Fighters or Bombers.

Infant stage of BioMech development. Typically docile, occasionally aggressive.
A BioMech in the childhood stage. Will eventually mature into an adult.
Young adult BioMech. This is the most aggressive stage of development. Proceed with caution.
Full grown adult BioMech. Capable of reproduction and communication.

Consulor C70 Charger Refit^A Republic combat refit of the Consulor Judicial Cruiser^2 Heavy Turbo-laser Batteries.^2 Light Laser Batteries^1 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery.

Hammerhead Torpedo Corvette^Light Modular Corvette used by the Rebellion, Pirates, and Mercenaries^1 Heavy Turbo-laser Batteries.^1 Light Laser Batteries^2 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery, 2 Torpedo Tubes.
Outer Rim Rebel Fighter^Twin rapid-fire beams and 4 Missiles.
Clone Wars Surplus Fighter Bomber^Twin rapid-fire beam, 6 homing torpedoes.
M3-A Scyk Interceptor^A pirate's , light and nimble.^3 fast-fire beam, 3 homing torpedoes.
Kihraxz Flight^A medium fighters used by Mercenaries, Pirates, and Bounty Hunters.^3 fast-fire beam
Kimogila Assault Fighter Flight^A assault fighter favored by mercenaries and bounty hunters.^3 fast-fire beam, 9 homing torpedoes.
U-wing Rebel Assault Transport^Armed only with a Dual Rapid-fire laser and Torpedos, this shuttle is designed to move cargo and people into combat.
Rebel Short Ranged Shuttle Pod^Armed only with a Twin-Linked light laser, this shuttle is designed to move cargo and people over short distances.
Imperial Lambda Class Shuttle^Armed only with a 2 light laser turrets, this shuttle is designed to move cargo and people over short distances.
Multi-Use Escape Pod^A modified escape pod^acts as a small shuttle on frieghters^One fast-fire beam
Sheathipede Shuttle^A reburbished CIS Transport Shuttle.^One fast-fire beam.
G9 Rigger Light Frieghter^A heavily armed frieghter often used as an assault transport by pirates and mercenaries^2 fast-fire beam,1 Heavy Rapid Cannon
Citadel-class Civilian Cruiser ^A heavily armed light transport for an unsafe universe.^3 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery.^1 Torpedo tube.

MC40 Multipurpose Cruiser^Rebellion Mon Calamari Multipurpose Cruiser which is the mainstay of the Rebel Fleet^6 Heavy Turbolaser Batteries, 4 Light Laser Cannon Batteries, 2 Medium Anti-Fighter Batteries^2 Torpedo tube^Stores for 8 homing, 2 Nuke, 6 mines, 4 ECM, 2 PShock.
Munificent Star Frigate^Separatist converted warship.^10 Heavy Turbo-laser Batteries.^2 Light Laser Batteries^1 Light and 1 Heavy Anti-Fighter Batteries^3 Fighter Squadrons.

Recusant Light Destroyer^Separatist converted warship used by Mercenaries, Pirates, cartels and Hutt Clans.^10 Heavy Turbo-laser Batteries.^5 Light Laser Batteries^1 Light Anti-Fighter Batteries^2 Torpedo tube^2 Fighter Squadrons.
Neutron Star Bulk Cruiser^Old converted warship.^7 Heavy Turbo-laser Batteries.^8 Light Laser Batteries^2 Medium Anti-Fighter Batteries.^4 Fighter Squadrons and 2 Shuttles
GR75C Medium Freighter^Combat Refit of the Medium Freighters used for as light carriers and rescue craft.^2 Light Laser Batteries^1 Medium Anti-Fighter Battery^2 Fighter Squadrons.
